r.s: A test runner for Test Driven Development
r.d: Stagehand_TestRunner provides a test runner to run unit tests. Stagehand_TestRunner strongly supports Test Driven Development by various features.
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_TestRunner 2.18.0
Improved Notifications
(Issue #309, #311)
The following improvements have been made:
* Provides the icons for notifications. * Uses the "growlnotify" command (Windows, Mac OS X) or the "notify-send" command instead of the Net_Growl package. * Sends the fatal error message when monitoring changes.
For more information, see the User Guide (http://redmine.piece-framework.com/projects/stagehand-testrunner/wiki/Stagehand_TestRunner_User_Guide_2_18_0#Notifies-test-results).
Runs tests at the beginning of monitoring changes.
(Issue #318)
If the "-a" option is specified, Stagehand_TestRunner runs tests unconditionally at the beginning.
Three Defect Fixes
The following defects have been fixed:
* The preload script is not loaded when specifying multiple options after one "-". (Issue #312) * Some command line options are lost with the monitoring feature. (Issue #314) * An underscore is not treated as a word separator in TestDox. (Issue #317)
